overview.Name: International Business Machines
overview.Description: International Business Machines Corporation (IBM) is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Armonk, New York, with operations in over 170 countries. The company began in 1911, founded in Endicott, New York, as the Computing-Tabulating-Recording Company (CTR) and was renamed International Business Machines in 1924. IBM is incorporated in New York. IBM produces and sells computer hardware, middleware and software, and provides hosting and consulting services in areas ranging from mainframe computers to nanotechnology. IBM is also a major research organization, holding the record for most annual U.S. patents generated by a business (as of 2020) for 28 consecutive years. Inventions by IBM include the automated teller machine (ATM), the floppy disk, the hard disk drive, the magnetic stripe card, the relational database, the SQL programming language, the UPC barcode, and dynamic random-access memory (DRAM). The IBM mainframe, exemplified by the System/360, was the dominant computing platform during the 1960s and 1970s.

company.Name: Kwesw Corp
company.Description: Kwesw Corp operates as a technology solutions company, providing innovative services to small businesses. The company is headquartered in San Francisco, USA.

company.Name: Painreform Ltd
company.Description: PainReform Ltd., a pharmaceutical company specializing in clinical stages, is dedicated to the development of therapies that provide an extended period of post-surgical pain relief in Israel. The company is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.

company.Name: Brogw Enterprises
company.Description: Brogw Enterprises is a leading agricultural company that specializes in innovative crop management solutions. It is based in Des Moines, Iowa.

company.Name: CTV Holdings
company.Description: CTV Holdings operates in the renewable energy sector, focusing on community solar projects. The company is headquartered in Denver, Colorado.

company.Name: Soar Technologies
company.Description: Soar Technologies develops advanced aerospace systems and cutting-edge aviation software. It is headquartered in Seattle, USA.

company.Name: Lev Group
company.Description: Lev Group is an innovative company specializing in energy-efficient lighting solutions for commercial and residential applications. It is based in Austin, Texas.

company.Name: NIOBW Inc.
company.Description: NIOBW Inc. operates as a provider of autonomous driving software and systems. The company is headquartered in Palo Alto, California.

company.Name: Haiaw Pharmaceuticals
company.Description: Haiaw Pharmaceuticals specializes in developing innovative treatments for rare diseases and complex medical conditions. It is headquartered in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

company.Name: Flyx Aviation
company.Description: Flyx Aviation provides maintenance, repair, and overhaul (MRO) services for commercial airlines. The company is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia.

company.Name: Petww Logistics
company.Description: Petww Logistics is a global leader in supply chain solutions, specializing in cold storage and transportation. It is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois.

company.Name: CleanSky Inc.
company.Description: CleanSky Inc. is a leading provider of renewable energy technologies and solutions, focusing on solar and wind energy systems. The company is headquartered in Austin, Texas.

company.Name: Kacel Worldwide

company.Name: Horizon Tools

company.Name: Sovereign Energy
